Market News April 19, 2018 / 10:16 AM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Perry Ellis Notified U.S. Bank National Association To Redeem Remaining $50 Mln Outstanding 7.875% Senior Subordinated Notes Due 2019 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 19 (Reuters) - Perry Ellis International Inc: 
* PERRY ELLIS -ON APRIL 18, NOTIFIED U.S. BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION TO REDEEM REMAINING $50 MILLION OUTSTANDING 7.875% SENIOR SUBORDINATED NOTES DUE IN 2019 
* PERRY ELLIS INTERNATIONAL INC - EXPECTS TO PAY REDEMPTION PRICE FOR NOTES WITH REPATRIATED FUNDS AND FROM ITS SENIOR CREDIT FACILITY Source text: ( bit.ly/2qLkcce ) Further company coverage:
